script-text:
Returns the child text content of the element.
Can be set, to replace the element's children with the given value.
slot-name: Can be used to get and set slot's name.
slot-assignednodes:
Returns slot's assigned nodes, if any, and slot's children
otherwise, and does the same for any slot elements encountered therein, recursively,
until there are no slot elements left.
slot-assignedelements:
Returns the same as assignedNodes({ flatten: true
}), limited to elements.
